The SpaDES.addins package

Source: R/spades-addins-package.R
spades-addins-package.Rd

Provides 'RStudio' addins for 'SpaDES' packages and 'SpaDES' module development.

SpaDES module development

RStudio addins:

  • copy an existing SpaDES module

  • create a new SpaDES module

helper functions:

  • none yet

SpaDES package development

RStudio addins:

  • load the development version of SpaDES from ~/GitHub/SpaDES.

helper functions:

  • none yet

See also

  • http://spades-addins.predictiveecology.org/

  • https://github.com/PredictiveEcology/SpaDES.addins

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/PredictiveEcology/SpaDES.addins/issues
